page.title: 16Motels
page.content: HUNTER'S LODGE Years ago, Hunter's Lodge was a transport cafe.Motorway opened,cafe trade finished.Bought in 1976,named Hunter's Lodge 1979. 9 Bedrooms constructed.Later in 1981 Partridge Suite opened,caters for functions. People come from foreign countries. They have their own key.It is successful. CHARNOCK RICHARD HOTEL Formerly White House Garage.Hotel built 1983-84.Opened November 1984.Functions as motel,restaurant and function centre.Near motorway exit on M6.Half way between London and Glasgow.People from all over the world stay there. Currently four chalets.Twenty five planned. There is another motel near the motorway service station.
